dungeons.name: Goblin Den
dungeons.description: A cramped network of tunnels infested with goblins, scout bats and the occasional goblin shaman. Expect many small skirmishes and quick, low-reward drops.

boss.name: Troll Warlord
boss.notes: Single powerful melee boss that appears after most tiles explored.

dungeons.name: Slime Pond
dungeons.description: Mucous pools and slippery banks. Slimes dominate the area; some water-twisted abominations lurk deeper.

boss.name: Bog Sea-Serpent
boss.notes: Powerful water-element boss; vulnerable to fire but resists ice.

dungeons.name: Howling Woods
dungeons.description: A moonlit forest where wolves and lone predators roam. Watch for ambushes from packs.

boss.name: Forest Troll
boss.notes: A heavy-hitting beast; packs may lead you to it.

dungeons.name: Frozen Grotto
dungeons.description: Glittering caverns of ice and ancient frost magic. Cold damages some equipment; fire-based attacks shine here.

boss.name: Frost Guardian
boss.notes: Elemental boss—very weak to fire, immune/reduced to ice.

dungeons.name: Haunted Crypt
dungeons.description: Mausoleums and bone-lined halls. Skeletons and necromantic mages haunt the corridors; expect undead resistances and holy vulnerabilities.

boss.name: Crypt Specter
boss.notes: Ethereal foe with high magic defense; sacred/holy attacks are most effective.

dungeons.name: Fire Embers
dungeons.description: Ruins warmed by volcanic fissures. Fire imps skitter through the ash—beware groups and burning hazards.

boss.name: Scorch Imp Trio
boss.notes: Clustered elemental boss fight (multiple imps acting as a single encounter).
